name: 陳盈竹
objective:
本課程內容包括流體力學，動量傳送。
This course contents fluid mechanics, momentum transfer .
schedule:
Week#1: Course overview
Week#2: Fundamental conceppt of fluid mechanics & Fluid properties
Week#3: Pascal’s Law, Hydrostatic Pressure Variations, Manometry
Week#4: Forces on Submerged Surfaces I
Week#5: Forces on Submerged Surfaces II
Week#6: Buoyancy & the Bernoulli Equation
Week#7: Bernoulli Equation Examples
Week#8: Fluid Statics
Week#9: Mid-term exam
Week#10: Fluid Kinematics
Week#11: Reynolds Transport Theorem & Conservation of Mass
Week#12: Continuity Equation & Linear Momentum Equation
Week#13: Energy Equation & Differential Continuity Equation
Week#14: Navier-Stokes Equations
Week#15: Viscous Flow in Pipes, Laminar Pipe Flow Characteristics
Week#16: Laminar & Turbulent Pipe Flow
Week#17: Minor Losses in Pipe Flow
Week#18: Final exam
materials:
1.	Fundamentals of Fluid Mechanics by B. R. Munson et al., 7th Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Hoboken, N.J., 2013.
2.	流體力學 (精編本), 周德明，龔傑 編譯，高立，2019.
